entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening and ending overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
